snippet.title: Developers Need To Broaden Their Range
snippet.description: By Mike Loukides Since Facebook’s Carlos Bueno wrote the canonical article about the full stack, there has been no shortage of posts trying to define it. For a time, Facebook allegedly only hired “full-stack developers.” That probably wasn’t quite true, even if they thought it was. And some posts really push [...] read »

snippet.title: Oracle​Voice: There's Java In Your Tweets
snippet.description: This cover story from Java magazine discusses how Twitter is migrating its core infrastructure to the Java Virtual Machine to enhance reliability and performance as it supports more than 200 million active monthly users and more than 400 million tweets per day. read »

snippet.title: Oracle​Voice: Top 12 Reasons To Attend Oracle OpenWorld 2013
snippet.description: Want to hear how real users are applying innovative IT solutions to transform their businesses? Then head to Oracle OpenWorld 2013, taking place September 22-26 at San Francisco's Moscone Center. The conference will be packed with customers telling their own success stories about big data, cloud, customer experience, HCM, Java, and engineered [...] read »

The question is, who is going to make this all happen? Organizations are relying on information technology managers and professionals, to a large [...] read »
